channel.title: Zak and Josh
channel.description:
This truly dynamic duo created a time machine out of a Delorean with a "flux capacitor" that, when gunned to 88 mph, would fling its passengers back to the future.

They've since settled in the Whatcom county area where they record a weekly podcast that you may not be ready for, but your kids are going to love.

Search "zak and josh" in the itunes music store, or go here:
http://www.podcastalley.com/podcast_details.php?pod_id=67894
channel.itunes:subtitle: This truly dynamic duo created a time machine out of a Delorean with a "flux capacitor" that, when gunned to 88 mph, would fling its passengers back to the future. They've since settled in the Whatcom county area where they record a weekly podcas

item.title: Who the fuck is Rebecca Black?
item.description:
Josh watched a youtube video and was inspired to record a TOTALLY impromptu solo podcast. Do yourself a favor and watch the music video “Friday” by Rebecca Black prior to listening.

Before and after the ten minute rant is a good song by The Dodos called “Companions” off of their new album “No Color”. If you live in Bellingham, they’re playing at the Wild Buffalo on April 2nd. Zak and Josh will be there.

You are loved.
item.itunes:subtitle: Josh watched a youtube video and was inspired to record a TOTALLY impromptu solo podcast. Do yourself a favor and watch the music video “Friday” by Rebecca Black prior to listening. Before and after the ten minute rant is a good son
item.itunes:summary: Josh watched a youtube video and was inspired to record a TOTALLY impromptu solo podcast. Do yourself a favor and watch the music video “Friday” by Rebecca Black prior to listening. Before and after the ten minute rant is a good song by The Dodos called “Companions” off of their new album “No Color”. If you live in Bellingham, they’re playing at the Wild Buffalo on April 2nd. Zak and Josh will be there. You are loved.

item.title: Halloween!
item.description:
It’s been sooooo long. And we haven’t gotten any better at this. But we still try.

On this special Halloween podcast we talk about slutty costumes, our costumes (lazy, not slutty), how old are you to trick or treat?, did you egg?, Zak’s need for a sexier ride, Josh’s need for a sexier life, According to Jim, and probably other stuff I can’t remember.

A sincere “Thank You” if you listen to this.

Songs: Halloween and Skulls by The Misfits.

item.title: Episode 83
item.description:
This memorial day Zak and Josh get blackout drunk. Oops! We talk trivia, Ski to Sea today, Ski to Sea history, Ski to Sea: the film, Back to the Future, dead celebs, our fading memories, a baseball blunder, oil!, an SNL quiz, our mall pasts, Zak’s top 4 album covers, and what we’re into.

Songs: Twelve Roses and The Horse by Beach Fossils

Visit us every Tuesday night for Trivia at Uisce Irish Pub!

item.title: Episode 82
item.description:
Welcome to the studio! In this episode Zak takes Josh into the matrix, Josh quizzes Zak on flicks, a three dimensional discussion is had, netflix or no netflix?! is played, the Porno clips of the week! are presented, Hispanic comedian infidelity is dismissed, Josh becomes Miss USA, a trifecta of POTDW is brought, age appropriate dating is debated and our jams are listed.

Songs: Jesus and Living in America by DOM

item.title: Episode 81
item.description:
Back at it on a Friday night! And it feels good. We dive right in and Zak fails a quiz, 9 things to do when it’s hot, the 4 Tops, The nap heard ‘round the world, snakes snakes snakes, the triumphant return of Meth or No Meth?!, The Fatass of the Week!, the death of Law and Order, some FKMs, the barefoot bandit, and summer flirting.

Songs: Bloodbuzz Ohio and Lemonworld by The National

item.title: Episode 80
item.description:
We celebrate Zak’s new digs by recording Episode 80! And we find out that it might just be radioactive. We also talk IKEA, porn, AZ and how bunk it is, the death of a scientologist, the life of an actor, baby names, Ukrainian politics (seriously), LT, and what you should get up in.

Songs: Soft in the Center and The Weekenders by The Hold Steady

item.title: Episode 79
item.description:
Two weeks too long! We’re back at it! Well, Josh is ... with a familiar friend. But this time he has his own mic.

Josh and NICK get into Zak vs. Josh vs. Nick, a pupil is mastered, a ratings debate, a four loco, a pair of FKMs, Colin Farrell Death Watch!, a ridiculous conversation with no real conclusions made, a stolen quiz, R/Lt/W, and our sponsors.

Songs: O.N.E. and I Remember by Yeasayer

item.title: Episode 78
item.description:
A Zak-centric episode! Happy b-day to baby blue eyes. And we dive into stolen segments, segments reclaimed, new new new Sparks, Zak is honestly the worst at Movie Quote Quizzes, Zak is also the worst at creating Movie Quote Quizzes, Hey What Meth or No Meth is in that Shopping Cart?!, Pete is alive, Pretty vs. Sexy, and four birthdays.

item.title: Episode 77
item.description:
Josh is surrounded by broads! Is it odd that we learn a lot about Zak when he is not even there? Ask his girlfriend, Jodie!

Josh gets a feminine viewpoint on a questionnaire, a couple of cagy quizzes, our four qualities, the youth of America (not the POD song), porn, and what the peeps should dive into.

Songs: You’re Going Back and A Lion’s Heart by The Tallest Man on Earth

item.title: Episode 76
item.description:
Do April showers really bring May flowers? What if they’re golden? ... the flowers, pervs.

In this, the weirdest episode ever: rude guests, new Lokos, Zombies, chocolate hands, baseball quotes, fem-bomb, Chuck quit while Peter won’t, Josh is Jesus, “You Had it Coming”, Porno clips, Meth, and Zak bought a PS3.

Songs: “Cold War” and “Excuses” by the Morning Benders

item.description:
We have peeps in the studio! And boy are they bored. item.description:
It’s bone and biggie biggie, it’s bone and biggie biggie. item.description:
Zmo and the bear are back in the studio to talk shit again! They rap about U.S.A.!, the new soccer (hockey), civil quotes, this world is f’d up!, Zak aces a quiz, Josh aces a quiz, general FKMs, Josh pontificates about whales, top 4 and 72 episodes ago, To the Gentlemen, god had a Boner, and everything we’re into right now.

item.description:
Sorry for the delay! But we are both adjusting to Zak re-insertion ... into the workforce.

Weekday podcast! item.title: Episode 67
item.description:
Sorry for the delay!!! But Josh’s brain is rapidly disintegrating, have you heard? This week in Zak and Josh land: a legend is born, a listener is called out, a fledgling movie career is pimped, a pair of globes are admired, Indiana is dying, decades are ranked, deaths are quizzed, Josh is Browned, hours are made happy, women celebrate freedom to do what they should, King Felix is signed, C.C. is fatassed (but rich), the Superbowl matchup is willed, and we tell you what to read/watch/listen to.

Call us! 206-426-0943

item.title: Episode 66
item.description:
What you should be Watching, Listening to, and Reading. Who’s Pushing That Shopping Cart? First, let’s talk about kids: Hate ‘em. Under 18? Worthless. Gumby, too soon? Josh has a big chin. item.description:
These hands are my father’s hands but smaller.

Thanks, Dad.

item.title: Episode 57
item.description:
Z and J are back with another installment of talk barely interesting to people they know personally!

This week: Passenger 57, Zak should still be ashamed, bad Rivers, Helen Keller did NOT fuck (email/call us zakandjosh@gmail.com, 206-426-0943), Joose, baby boners?, school on fire, flaming memories (not gay), a diatribe against white guilt, the shirt of Zak, dead names, and a word about our sponsors.

The music tonight is certainly not Weezer. Fuck Weezer.

item.title: Episode 56
item.description:
Wow! Four days late ... it was a good Halloween, I guess.

Well, we had a chat about a spooky quiz, four spooky monsters, how Peter is not a spooky zombie, getting spooked to the CORE, a spooky dad, a spooky and fucked up world, a shitty game that we are never going to play again, Reign/Rain/Rainn, spooking the ladies, Josh is spooky, tennis meth vs. tennis hot, and controversial fatasses.

item.title: Episode 53
item.description:
Josh returns to Bellingham and to the loving arms of his greatest podcasting friend, Zak.

These two star-crossed lovers get down to the nitty gritty:

Nipple tassels, Playgirl (TM), WHoOoOoO Am I????!!!, boss down-boning, the four worst dogs, the five best boroughs, the return of meth, The Best of 10 Square Blocks of Bellingham, Peter O’Toole is the Grim Reaper, Josh had a sex dream!, and a weird movie quiz.

item.title: Episode 50
item.description:
Episode 50?! Wow. Thanks to anyone who has ever listened to a second of this rubbish that we put on the internet week in and week out.

This week Zak and Josh get drunk and talk 45 minutes longer than normal.

Songs: You Will Remember Tonight, Girls Own Love, and The End of Our Lives, by Andrew W.K.

Oh, and honestly: thank you.
